misc: Appreciates the thoughtful course designs of Kosti Kuronen who passed away in 2024
biography: Ofri, a golfer hailing from Golf Pirkkala, is known for his meticulous approach to the game. Hailing from the vibrant city of Tampere, Finland, Ofri brings a unique blend of focus and quiet determination to the course.

Those who know Ofri would describe him as an introspective player, often seen studying the course with a keen eye, appreciating the nuances of each hole. He has mentioned that he especially appreciates the thoughtful course designs of Kosti Kuronen, whose legacy continues to inspire him.

Hector Troph√©e 2025 will mark Ofri's third appearance in the competition. While he is yet to secure a win, his dedication and passion for the game make him a formidable competitor. Spectators can anticipate his continued presence in future Hector events.
